experimental-general.name: Experimental
experimental-general.description: The feature is Experimental. It may be dropped or changed at any time. Use it only for evaluation purposes.

experimental-opt-in.name: Experimental
experimental-opt-in.description: The feature is Experimental. It may be dropped or changed at any time. Opt-in is required (see the details below), and you should use it only for evaluation purposes.

alpha.name: Alpha
alpha.description: The feature is in Alpha. It may change incompatibly and require manual migration in the future.

beta.name: Beta
beta.description: The feature is in Beta. It is almost stable, but migration steps may be required in the future. We'll do our best to minimize any changes you have to make.

eap.name: EAP
eap.description: This functionality is available only in the latest EAP version.
